title: I have *insert extremely controversial action here* # times today AMA
body:
*poor explanation of why the action was justified*
*respond to all comments in such a way that you sound like an idiot/asshole*
*commence downvotes*

replies.body:
*proceeds to defend without actually reading the OP
will keep defending in hopes of winning*
*says affirmative statements*
_Proceeds to add a completely irrelevant meme to the situation. Then uses the 'joke went over your head' when someone calls me out on it._
*confused comment as to why you put this meme here*
_'joke went over your head' meme_
